animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I like to play in water.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 You can drink what I give.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?
I purr and like to cuddle. I chase mice and play with string. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. I never forget. What am I?

hints.text: 🚿 I use my trunk as a hose.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I like a particular yellow fruit.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I have stripes all over my body.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. What am I?
I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees in warm places.
🟡 My color is the same as the sun.

food.question: I am round and red, and I keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 People say eating me is healthy.
🟥 I am often the color of fire trucks.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often poured on cereal.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time.
🔶 My color is similar to a pumpkin.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
🥣 I'm often eaten with a spoon.
👪 I often grow with my friends in a little house.

food.question: I am made from wheat and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am made from a grain.
🥪 You can put peanut butter and jelly on me.

food.question: I am orange and juicy. People drink me for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I'm often enjoyed in the morning.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, and I am crispy and salty. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with ketchup.
🥔 I start as a root vegetable.
🧂 People like to add salt to me.

food.question: I am round and covered in seeds. I can be red, green, or yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am often eaten in the summer.
⚫ My seeds can be black or white.

food.question: I am a treat that's cold and sweet. I come in many flavors, and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I can be in a cone.
🍓 I am often flavored with fruit or chocolate.
🥶 You need to keep me in the freezer.
